item.name: Auth
item.description: The `/me` endpoints let you manage information about the authenticated user.

body.raw:
{
    "status": "active", // draft, invited, active, draft, suspended, deleted
    "role": 1, // 1=Admin
    "first_name": "Test",
    "last_name": "User",
    "email": "testuser@gmail.com",
    "password": "123456789",
    "theme": "auto", // auto, light, dark
    "timezone": "UTC",
    "locale": "en-US", // en-US, ar-SA
    "avatar": null, // File ID 
    "title": null, // Postion
    "email_notifications": false
}

{
    "status": "published", // draft
    "sort": null, // EX: 1, 2, 3
    "question": "السؤال يوضع هنا",
    "answer": "مثال للإجابة",
    "answer_en": "Example for Answar !",
    "question_en": "Question Here"
}
